description:
Get started in seconds and begin your journey to streaming greatness with Gamecaster for free. Go live to Twitch, Facebook or YouTube.
		If this package isn't up-to-date for some days, please [create an issue](https://github.com/RalfEs73/chocolatey-packages/issues/new/choose).
summary: Free software for video recording and live streaming.
author: Gamecaster Pte Ltd.
